assembler

Class Language

  • java.lang.Object
    • assembler.Language

  • public class Language
extends java.lang.Object
    The Language class contains all of the instructions, code, and parameters of the assembly language along with methods to access information about the assembly language

    • Field Summary

        Parameters:

      • isInstruction

        public boolean isInstruction(java.lang.String instruction)
        Method that checks if a string is a valid assembly instruction
        Parameters:
        instruction - string to check
        Returns:
        true if given string is an instruction

      • getInstructionCode

        public int getInstructionCode(java.lang.String instruction)
        Gets the integer code of the a given instruction after checking if the provided string is a valid instruction
        Parameters:
        instruction - instruction to get code for
        Returns:
        given instructions code or -1 if the provide string is not a valid instruction

      • getInstruction

        public java.lang.String getInstruction(int code)
        Gets an instruction coressponding to a given code
        Parameters:
        code - code matching instruction
        Returns:
        the found instruction or INSTRUCTION_NOT_FOUND

      • numberOfParams

        public int numberOfParams(java.lang.String instruction)
        Returns the number of parameters a give instruction takes. Checks first to see if provided string is a valid instruction
        Parameters:
        instruction - instruction to get number of parameters for
        Returns:
        number of parameters the provided instruction takes or a -1 if the instruction is invalid

      • getParams

        public ParamType[] getParams(java.lang.String instruction)
        method that gets the parameter types an instruction takes after first checking if the instruction is valid
        Parameters:
        instruction - instruction to get parameter types for
        Returns:
        parameter types in a ParamType[] or an empty ParamType[]

        Returns:
